page.title: 19 STRATFORD MARKET'S FUTURE
page.content: THE SITE OF A STALL IN THE MARKET PLACE COSTS 180 POUNDS PER QUARTER IN RENT. MOST OF THE STALLHOLDERS IN THIS MARKET HAVE BEEN USING IT FOR 2 to 10 YEARS,ON AVERAGE. THE GENERAL FEELING AMONG STALLHOLDERS IS THAT THERE HAS BEEN A STEADY DECREASE IN TRADE OVER THE LAST FEW YEARS.EVEN SO,THE MARKET IS STILL CONSIDERED TO BE QUITE GOOD. IN THEIR OPINION THE RECENT INTRODUCT- ION OF THE "CREDIT CARD" HAS BEEN THE MAIN CAUSE OF THE DECLINE OF THE MARKET. THIS IS BECAUSE PEOPLE FIND IT EASIER TO CARRY ROUND A CREDIT CARD INSTEAD OF MONEY,AND BECAUSE OF THIS PEOPLE TEND TO USE SHOPS WHERE THE CREDIT CARD IS ACCEPTABLE CURRENCY.BUT AS FAR AS THE GENERAL IMPRESSION OF THE MARKET GOES THE STALLHOLDERS AGREED THAT THEY HAVEN'T SEEN ANY REAL CHANGES IN IT OVER THE YEARS.
